Adjacent to the living room, with floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking a landscaped garden. Layout respects traditional spatial harmony and natural light alignment.

Larger master bedroom suite incorporating private balcony with expansive windows to enhance light and promote calm. Designed with Vastu principles ensuring privacy and energy balance.
